title: World Series Game 2, Lonzo Ball, Jon Gruden, & Aaron Rodgers
itunes:title: World Series Game 2, Lonzo Ball, Jon Gruden, & Aaron Rodgers
description:
Colin discusses why people shouldn't be blaming Los Angeles Dodgers Manager Dave Roberts why Los Angeles Lakers G Lonzo Ball works well with the current team, what Oakland Raiders HC Jon Gruden should try to avoid, and why Green Bay Packers QB Aaron Rodgers is in a tough spot. Guests include Greg Cosell, Jay Glazier, and Tom Penn.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
